mapper.select: SELECT total_title, ann_type, reception_type, sub_title, task_type, planning_year, tech_field_name, perf_owner FROM announcement a INNER JOIN sub_announcement sa ON a.ann_no = sa.ann_no WHERE sa.sub_ann_no = #{subAnnNO}
SELECT NEXT VALUE FOR seq_rnd_plan FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rnd_plan(rnd_plan_no, rnd_task_no, sub_ann_no, mem_no, task_name, plan_status, curr_step, created_at) VALUES (#{rndPlanNo}, #{rndTaskNo}, #{subAnnNo}, #{memNo}, #{taskName}, #{planStatus}, #{currStep}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

INSERT INTO rnd_field ( rnd_field_no, rnd_plan_no, name, weight, rank ) VALUES
( NEXT VALUE FOR seq_rnd_field, #{rndField.rndPlanNo}, #{rndField.name}, #{rndField.weight}, #{rndField.rank} )
